messages.content:
तुमच्या दिलेल्या चित्रात पानांवर लाल-तपकिरी ठिपके आणि मऊ स्वरूप दिसत आहे. हे एक संभाव्य समस्या दर्शवू शकते, जसे की फंगसचा संसर्ग किंवा पोषणाची कमतरता.

अधिक अचूक विश्लेषण आणि शिफारसींसाठी, कृपया अधिक स्पष्ट चित्र द्या, विशेषतः प्रभावित भागांवर लक्ष केंद्रित करताना. चांगल्या प्रकाशात जवळचा शॉट उपयुक्त ठरेल.

तुम्हाला अधिक मदतीसाठी स्पष्ट चित्र द्यायचे आहे का?
messages.en:
Your given picture shows red-brown dots and soft appearance on the leaves. This could indicate a potential problem, such as a fungal infection or nutritional deficiency.

For more accurate analysis and recommendations, please give a more clear picture, especially when focusing on affected areas. A close shot would be helpful in good light.

Do you want to give a clearer picture for more help?

messages.standalone_question: What is the application of April ethepon?
messages.standalone_en: What is the application of April ethepon?

messages.content:
Ethephon is a plant growth regulator commonly used in grape cultivation to promote ripening and enhance fruit quality. For your grape crop in the "Beginning Veraison" stage, the application of ethephon is typically done when the berries are at the appropriate size and color change is starting to occur.

Since you are currently in the "Beginning Veraison" stage, you can consider applying ethephon in early April, around the time when the berries are beginning to change color. 

Make sure to follow the recommended dosage and application method as per the product guidelines. Additionally, monitor weather conditions to avoid applying it before rain, which could wash away the treatment. 

If you need specific application dates or further assistance, please let me know!
messages.en:

messages.standalone_question: What is the application process for ethrel?
messages.standalone_en: What is the application process for ethrel?

messages.content:
इस सप्ताह (22 फरवरी से 28 फरवरी) के लिए "Plot No 3 Sudhakar" पर कोई फफूंदी या कीट नियंत्रण की फवारणी की योजना नहीं है। 

आप इथरेल की फवारणी कर सकते हैं, खासकर जब अंगूर की बेरी का रंग बदलने लगे। यह फवारणी आमतौर पर अप्रैल के पहले सप्ताह में की जाती है। 

यदि आपको और जानकारी चाहिए या किसी विशेष तिथि पर सलाह चाहिए, तो कृपया बताएं!
messages.en:
No mildew or pest control sprays are planned on "Plot No 3 Sudhakar" for this week (February 22 to February 28). 

You can squirt etherel, especially when the grape berry begins to change color. This shower is usually done in the first week of April. 

If you need further information or advice on a particular date, please let us know!
